TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ForestTrustDomainStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the status of a forest trust relationship.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus Enabled = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The forest trust relationship is enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus NetBiosNameAdminDisabled = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The forest trust NetBIOS record is disabled by administrative action.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus NetBiosNameConflictDisabled = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The forest trust NetBIOS record is disabled due to a conflict with an existing NetBIOS record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus SidAdminDisabled = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The forest trust SID is disabled by administrative action.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus SidConflictDisabled = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The forest trust SID is disabled due to a conflict with an existing SID.
